description: Darrell Lake, 30, a coach at a DeKalb County high school, is facing a charge of sexual assault.
title: DeKalb school coach charged with sexual assault
title_page: DeKalb school coach charged with sexual assault
text:
A DeKalb County high school coach is facing a charge of sexual assault.
Darrell Lake, 30, was taken into custody March 6 at the school.
According to jail records, Lake posted bail on March 11.
District officials confirmed that an employee had been taken into custody at the high school, but declined to comment on the charges.
Darrell Lake (Special to AJC)
“The matter is also under review by the district and we will respond appropriately,” district officials said in a statement. “The health and safety of our students and staff are always our top priorities, and we will continue to ensure that those priorities are met.”
